languages.text: {n}Кассия понимающе кивает.{/n} "Теобальд и Фелек пытались уменьшить влияние моих сил на плебеев, прислуживающих на Эурак-V. В лабораторумах станции проводили исследования на тех, кому не посчастливилось сойти с ума от моего дара. Это увеличило продолжительность жизни слуг... А затем они встали на сторону Фелека".

{n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия понимающе кивает.{/n} "Теобальд и Фелек пытались уменьшить влияние моих сил на плебсов, прислуживающих на Эурак-V. В лабораторумах станции проводили исследования на тех, кому не посчастливилось сойти с ума от моего дара. Это увеличило продолжительность жизни слуг... А затем они встали на сторону Фелека".

The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

{n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

{n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

{n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

languages.text: {n}カシアは理解を示したようにうなずく。{/n}「セオバルドとフェレックは、私の力がユーラック・Vの庶民に与える影響を制限しようとしました。施設の研究所では、私の力によって精神を失った不幸な者たちに実験を行っていました。これらの試験は使用人たちの寿命を延ばしましたが…彼らはフェレック側についたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは理解を示したようにうなずく。{/n}「セオバルドとフェレックは、私の力がユーラック・Vの庶民に与える影響を制限しようとしました。施設の研究所では、私の力によって精神を失った不幸な者たちに実験を行っていました。これらの試験は使用人たちの寿命を延ばしましたが…彼らはフェレック側についたのです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia acquiesce.{/n} « Théobald et Felek ont essayé de réduire l'influence qu'avaient mes pouvoirs sur les serviteurs les plus humbles d'Eurac-V. Les laboratoriums de la station ont mené des expériences sur les malheureux qui avaient perdu l'esprit à cause de mon don. Ces essais ont eu pour résultat d'allonger l'espérance de vie de nos serviteurs... et ils ont rejoint les rangs de Felek. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia acquiesce.{/n} « Théobald et Felek ont essayé de réduire l'influence qu'avaient mes pouvoirs sur les serviteurs les plus humbles d'Eurac-V. Les laboratoriums de la station ont mené des expériences sur les malheureux qui avaient perdu l'esprit à cause de mon don. Ces essais ont eu pour résultat d'allonger l'espérance de vie de nos serviteurs... et ils ont rejoint les rangs de Felek. »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅若有所思地点了点头。{/n}“西奥巴德和费雷克曾试图限制我的力量，让我不要影响欧拉克五号星站的下仆。他们将那些被我的力量逼疯的人带到实验室，在他们身上进行了实验。那些试验延长了仆人们的寿命……随后，那些人就加入了费雷克的阵营。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅若有所思地点了点头。{/n}“西奥巴德和费雷克曾试图限制我的力量，让我不要影响欧拉克五号星的下仆。他们将那些被我的力量逼疯的人带到实验室，在他们身上进行了实验。那些试验延长了仆人们的寿命……随后，那些人就加入了费雷克的阵营。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente en señal de entendimiento.{/n} «Theobald y Felek trataron de mermar el efecto de mis poderes en los siervos de baja alcurnia de Eurac V. Los laboratorums de la estación llevaban a cabo experimentos con personas que habían enloquecido a raíz de mi don. Dichas pruebas incrementaban la esperanza de vida de nuestros siervos... y los hacían pasarse al bando de Felek».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente en señal de entendimiento.{/n} «Theobald y Felek trataron de mermar el efecto de mis poderes en los siervos de baja alcurnia de Eurac V. Los laboratorums de la estación llevaban a cabo experimentos con personas que habían enloquecido a raíz de mi don. Dichas pruebas incrementaban la esperanza de vida de nuestros siervos... y los hacían pasarse al bando de Felek».

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Theobald und Felek wollten die Auswirkungen meiner Kräfte auf die niederen Diener auf Eurac V begrenzen. Die Laboratorien der Station haben Experimente an jenen durchgeführt, die das Pech hatten, wegen meiner Gabe den Verstand zu verlieren. Diese Tests haben die Lebenserwartung unserer Diener erhöht ... und dann haben sie sich auf Feleks Seite geschlagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Theobald und Felek wollten die Auswirkungen meiner Kräfte auf die niederen Diener auf Eurac V begrenzen. Die Laboratorien der Station haben Experimente an jenen durchgeführt, die das Pech hatten, wegen meiner Gabe den Verstand zu verlieren. Diese Tests haben die Lebenserwartung unserer Diener erhöht ... und dann haben sie sich auf Feleks Seite geschlagen."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, anlar gibi başını sallıyor.{/n} "Theobald ile Felek de güçlerimin Eurac V'teki alt tabaka hizmetkârlar üzerindeki etkisini sınırlamaya çalışmıştı. İstasyondaki laboratorumlarda, ihsanım yüzünden melekelerini kaybetme talihsizliğini yaşayanlar üzerinde deneyler yaptılar. Bu sayede hizmetkârlarımızın ömrü uzadı. Sonra Felek'in saflarına katıldılar..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in understanding.{/n} "Theobald and Felek tried to limit the effect my powers had on the lowborn servants of Eurac V. The station's laboratorums ran experiments on those who had the misfortune of losing their minds because of my gift. These tests increased our servants' lifespan... and then they joined Felek's side."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, anlar gibi başını sallıyor.{/n} "Theobald ile Felek de güçlerimin Eurac V'teki alt tabaka hizmetkârlar üzerindeki etkisini sınırlamaya çalışmıştı. İstasyondaki laboratorumlarda, ihsanım yüzünden melekelerini kaybetme talihsizliğini yaşayanlar üzerinde deneyler yaptılar. Bu sayede hizmetkârlarımızın ömrü uzadı. Sonra Felek'in saflarına katıldılar..."
